content: {"name": "YMCA Boston @ Church of the Holy Spirit", "alternate_name": "", "description": "To register to attend a Community Cafe Meal Service at site, please call 617-477-6688 or email ethosmeals@ethocare.org", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ethocare.org/services/nutrition/community-cafes/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "525 River Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Southern Mattapan", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02126", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.2675642, "longitude": -71.0952554}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 298-0577", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Mobile pantry"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}]}
